00020 namespace windowmanager
00021 {
00022 class Callback;
00023 class WindowManagerDriver;
00024 namespace input

00026 
00027 class MovementDrivenDevice : public core::drivermodel::Driver
00028 {
00029         friend class windowmanager::WindowManagerDriver;
00030 
00031 public:
00032         virtual EString id() const = 0;
00033 
00034         virtual bool    isRelativeCaptureSupported() = 0;
00035         virtual void    relativeState(int* x,int* y) = 0;
00036 
00037         virtual bool    isAbsoluteCaptureSupported() = 0;

00039 
00040         virtual void setMode(unsigned mode) = 0;//Set processing mode
